name: Algotica Iterations
description: Algotica is an educational puzzle game about programming with cute lowpoly graphics. If you wanted to start learning programming but think that it too difficult to understand or just don't have enough time or not sure that you need it - this game is a good start point for...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 10 Processor: Intel I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 5xx / AMD Radeon HD 6850 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
